prompts: Create a powerful steel-type Pokemon that resembles a robotic creature with multiple limbs.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a metallic body and can float gracefully in the air.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek, angular shape and a color palette of gray and gold.
Show me a Pokemon with a tough exterior that thrives in mountainous terrains.
Generate a futuristic-looking Pokemon with a unique blend of steel and psychic powers.
Make a Pokemon that appears as a massive metallic fortress with sharp edges.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with a striking geometric design.

distinctive_features: Large X-shaped pattern on its face
